Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2011 05:05PM moyapeter wrote: So, I have been having a lot of trouble sleeping.  I actually have resorted a couple of nights to taking a 1/2 a pain pill to get to sleep.  Figured I would run out, so I went to the pharmacy to get some over-the-counter.  The pharmacist pointed out that Unisom and Sominex are the same thing as benedryl, just cost more.  Sure as heck, I looked, and it is!  So...  since I have been having trouble with the rash in my cleavage, and Benedryl could help, do you know if this is ok to do?  In  other words, can I take benedryl while on radiation?  They never mentioned taking benedryl for the rash....
